ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: and( not CONTAINS( $Profile.Name, "API" ), not CONTAINS( $Profile.Name, "Admin" ), not CONTAINS( $Profile.Name, "D&S Sales Analyst" ), SBU__c = "D&S", ISCHANGED( Type__c ), or( Text( Type__c ) = 'Booked', PRIORVALUE( Type__c ) = 'Booked', Text( Type__c ) = 'APO', PRIORVALUE( Type__c ) = 'APO' ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Type can only be changed by an Administrator.
